question: The National Company Law Appellate Tribunal (NCLAT) approved the acquisition of the Bhushan Power and Steel Ltd to which of the following companies?
explanation: The National Company Law Appellate Tribunal (NCLAT) approved the acquisition of the Bhushan Power and Steel Ltd to JSW Steel Ltd. JSW Steel Ltd. is an Indian steel-making company headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It was founded in the year 1982.
